author: brane
msg: Changed Windows build to use expat from apr-util instead of expat-lite.
* subversion.dsw: Add new projets aprutil and xml. Remove project libexpat.
Replace dependencies on libexpat with deps on aprutil and xml.
* build/win32/build_neon.bat: Pass correct EXPAT_FLAGS to the neon
makefile to find the expat in apr-util.
* (tons of .dsp files): Fix up all references to expat includes and libs.

author: sussman
msg: Fix bug #686.
* diff.c (reverse_propchanges):  new helper func that inverts an array
of propchanges.
(close_file, close_directory): reverse the propchanges before
passing them to props_changed callback.

author: cmpilato
msg: This is to fix Issue #680.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/path.c
(svn_path_compare_paths): Fix to group children of subdirs together,
just under the subdir itself.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * Makefile.in:  Remove SVN_EXPAT_INCLUDES since we rely on apr-util
to determine where expat includes are.
* build.conf: Add SVN_APRUTIL_LIBS in place of libexpat for
dependencies and to all targets that include SVN_APR_LIBS.  Remove
libexpat target.  We add SVN_APRUTIL_LIBS everywhere SVN_APR_LIBS is
used because we expect to use more of the apr-util functions as time
goes on - this will save us some grief later on hopefully.
* configure.in: Add usage of --old-expat switch in apu-config
(see recent commits to apr-util) to determine what expat version
we really have.  If apr-util says we have an old expat, define
SVN_HAVE_OLD_EXPAT.  Remove addition of expat-lite includes.
* subversion/include/svn_xml.h: Add check for SVN_HAVE_OLD_EXPAT
to determine the header name we need to include.
* subversion/libsvn_delta/xml_parse.c: Ditto.

author: striker
msg: * notes/assurance.txt
New file.  Pasted an email posted by Alex Holst about
assurance.
